text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm out for a walk on my day off<n>when I spot a downcast
Mayano Top<n>Gun.

text_block_list.name: Maya's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Oh hey, it's Maya! Hey, Maya! We<n>were talking about going
shopping<n>after this. Wanna join us?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hrm... Sorry, but I think I'm gonna<n>pass this time. I have to
head out now.

text_block_list.name: Maya's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Head out? Where?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna go see some airplanes!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh... hi.
choice_data_list:
You seem to be out of spirits. What's the
matter?

You seem to be out of spirits. What's the
matter?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hrmmmm...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Let's talk about something else. Are<n>you free?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Or... busy, maybe?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It looks like Mayano wants me to<n>stay, so I decide to
accompany her for<n>the day.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Touchdown! Ehehe, we're finally<n>here! ♪ It's a bit far from
the<n>academy, but I like this place a lot.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, look at that! That plane has a<n>special wrap! Wooow!
They even<n>have a Beluga here!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yep! You see that white plane? The<n>one that looks like it has
a giant head?<n>It's named Beluga after the whale! It<n>looks
like that 'cause it has to carry<n>other planes inside of it!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You don't get to see them often, so<n>we're super lucky
today! ♪ Oh right, I<n>should take a picture while I'm here...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Three... two... one... Cheese! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Nice, this one turned out great! ☆<n>Heh-heh... Looks as cute
as ever...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I mean, c'mon. The sky is full of allsorts of exciting things! And planes gozoooom right through it!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So of course I like planes! Who<n>wouldn't?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Actually, my dad really likes planes<n>too! He likes them so
much that he<n>became a pilot!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So on his days off, he'd bring me to<n>the airport like this and
show me the<n>different planes! And then we'd go<n>
shopping after we were done looking!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh... It's nothing! No big deal.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Enough about that. I'm starving!<n>Let's go grab a bite to eat
or<n>something! There's a lot of good food<n>at airports!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And after we're done eating, we can<n>walk around some
more!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
First, we'll go shopping! I wanna buy<n>some stuff for my
friends.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I need to buy something for Marvey<n>and Teio... Oh, and for
Yukipe, Biko,<n>and Flower too!
choice_data_list: You sure do have a lot of friends, Mayano.
You sure do have a lot of friends, Mayano.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, right?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hold up, we can't waste our time<n>just standing around like
this! C'mon,<n>let's go! Hurry!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
This day will go down as "The<n>Greatest Airport Adventure in<n>
Maya's Life"! It's time for takeoff!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After eating together, we have fun<n>walking around the
airport from store<n>to store, checking out everything it<n>has
to offer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Eventually...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wait, it's already this late?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It'll take some time to get back to the<n>academy. We gotta
get back before<n>curfew, so I guess we should head<n>out...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I try thinking of ways to cheer her up,<n>when suddenly, the
Beluga she told<n>me about earlier pops into my field of<n>
vision.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As it makes its way towards the<n>runway for takeoff, I come
up with an<n>idea.
choice_data_list:
Hey, Mayano. How about we stop by the
observation deck?

Hey, Mayano. How about we stop by the
observation deck?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? But why? ...Oh, wait!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: The Beluga's taking off! Whoa, I<n>wanna see it fly!
choice_data_list: If we get back late, I'll go apologize with you.
If we get back late, I'll go apologize with you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You will?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Okay, to the observation deck we go!<n>Takeoff!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoooa! Wooow! Did you see that?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: It was all like boooom, and then itwent like peeeew. "Beluga" reallyis the perfect name for it... It's like awhale that swims through the sky!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking at Mayano staring off into<n>the sky from the
observation deck, I<n>can see that she's back to her usual<n>
cheery self.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Nice! We made it juuust in time!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yep! A fun end to a fun day! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I reeeeally had a lot of fun today!<n>Like, so, so, so much fun!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Mom and Dad aren't here at the<n>academy. It's totally fine,
but...<n>sometimes I think about how I'm<n>here by myself,
and it makes me feel<n>kinda... lonely, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But I have soooo many friends, and<n>now I have you too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... Let's go on another<n>adventure together sometime,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun furiously waves<n>her hand then makes her
way back to<n>her dorm.
